purpose: Showcase multi-branch centralization advantage - one pharmacist at head office completes consultations visible to all senior management, enabling control across multiple locations.
core_message: One pharmacist at head office. All consultations visible to senior management. Control across 12 branches. That's what early adopters built.
summary: Single image positioning multi-branch centralization as operational advantage. Based on early adopter experience showing how Titanverse enables centralized service delivery with full visibility and control. Appeals to multi-branch owners seeking operational efficiency.
